column4: out of curiosity, what software are you using to create the burned cds?
you need python-dev
I've got python2.4-dev and it still dies.
what app are you attempting to compile?
openoffice.org2
oh, thanks!
no chance until it's in Dapper.
that will work, but you may need to follow directions on the wiki to use it under Breezy.
we've already fixed up some issue with the ZS under Dapper.
most Audigy 2s work OOTB
if you encounter any problems, ping me
do you know if there is an application that can be used as a system-wise equalizer? Or can that be done via hardware?
you may try searching the repositories. Certain applications include software eq.
generally there is no system-wide one, no.
the AUdigy 2 has 'CMSS: Stereo spatialization over 2 channels speakers' does the Ubuntu driver support that?
no.
software can emulate it (OpenAL, etc.)
it supports them, yes.
gutsy or hardy?
padsp -- wine foo.exe ?
or pasuspender -- wine foo.exe
I get that error when running winecfg
